products.title: Apple iPhone 14 Pro Max 128GB Deep Purple
products.description: Enhanced capabilities thanks to an enlarged display of 6.7 inches and work without recharging throughout the day. Incredible photos as in weak, yes and in bright light using the new system with two cameras.
products.fullDescription: Just as a book is judged by its cover, the first thing you notice when you pick up a modern smartphone is the display. Nothing surprising, because advanced technologies allow you to practically level the display frames and cutouts for the front camera and speaker, leaving no room for bold design solutions. And how good that in such realities Apple everything is fine with displays. Both critics and mass consumers always praise the quality of the picture provided by the products of the Californian brand.

comments.author: Alex K.
comments.text: Best phone I've ever owned. The display is incredibly smooth and camera quality is outstanding.

comments.author: Elena V.
comments.text: Stunning design. Zero regrets with this purchase.

products.title: Blackmagic Pocket Cinema Camera 6K
products.description: Professional cinema camera with 6K Super 35 sensor, 13 stops of dynamic range, and dual native ISO up to 25,600.
products.fullDescription: The Blackmagic Pocket Cinema Camera 6K features a Super 35 sensor with 6144 x 3456 resolution that lets you capture images at up to 6K resolution for digital film work. The larger sensor also gives you shallower depth of field, great low light performance and allows the use of EF photographic lenses.

comments.author: Fiona S.
comments.text: Captures moments perfectly. Worth the investment.

comments.author: Sandra M.
comments.text: Upgraded from DSLR. Mirrorless is the future.

comments.text: Great sensor. IBIS works really well.

products.title: Apple Watch Series 9 GPS 41mm Starlight Aluminium
products.description: The most advanced Apple Watch with new double tap gesture, powerful S9 chip, and brighter display.
products.fullDescription: Apple Watch Series 9 features the new S9 SiP with 5.6 billion transistors. A new 4-core Neural Engine can process machine learning tasks up to twice as fast. It enables the new double tap gesture, which allows you to control your Apple Watch without touching the display.
